SEARCH
Package ct326A1

Class Expense

java.lang.Object
ct326A1.Expense
public class Expense extends Object
The Expense class represents an employee's expense claim. Each expense has a date, description, amount, category, and approval status.

    • Expense

      public Expense(LocalDate date, String description, ExpenseCategory category, org.joda.money.Money amount) throws InvalidDateException
      Constructs an Expense with the specified date, description, category, and amount.
      Parameters:
      date - the date of the expense
      description - a description of the expense
      category - the category of the expense
      amount - the amount of the expense (in joda.money.Money)
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - if the provided date is in the future

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the expense in the format:

      Example: 2022-09-20: Dell 17-inch monitor - EQUIPMENT - USD 540.00
